snippet: On the day that the National Hockey League was to open its season, 18 amateur players gathered for a lunchtime pickup game less than a mile from the Rangers’ practice rink.
abstract: On the day that the National Hockey League was to open its season, 18 amateur players gathered for a lunchtime pickup game less than a mile from the Rangers’ practice rink.

headline.main: Opening Day Without the N.H.L.: Plenty of Games, if You Have Two Goalies
headline.print_headline: N.H.L. Is Frozen Out, but the Game Goes On: A Lunchtime Game
